keyword: how many calories are in a krispy kreme
title: How Many Calories Are in a Krispy Kreme?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut (190 kcal), plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick variations for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Krispy Kreme?
assumptions: Standard Original Glazed doughnut (~52 g), fresh from Krispy Kreme, no additional toppings or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, freshness, and customizations; values based on official Krispy Kreme data. Check packaging or app for exacts.

quick_answer.text: One Original Glazed Krispy Kreme doughnut contains 190 calories and 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed?
What are the carbs in a Krispy Kreme doughnut?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there protein in a Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: Yes, roughly 2 g protein per Original Glazed doughnut.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in a Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat (5 g saturated), 0 mg cholesterol, and 80 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Do different Krispy Kreme flavors have more calories?
faqs.a: Yes, filled or iced varieties often add 20â€“100 kcal; check specifics for each.
